headline: T. ROWE PRICE GROUP, INC., DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND
summary: T. Rowe Price Group (NASDAQ-GS: TROW), a global asset management firm and a leader in retirement, announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.27 per share payable September 29, 2025, to stockholders of record as of the close of business on September 15, 2025.
